categories: Category:Boba Fett: Enemy of the Empire

nodes.text: Boba Fett: Enemy of the Empire 1
Boba Fett: Enemy of the Empire 1 was the first issue in the Boba Fett: Enemy of the Empire series of comics. It was released January 27, 1999 by Dark Horse Comics.

Before the events of A New Hope, Darth Vader employed the galaxy's greatest bounty hunter on a search-and-retrieval mission: Boba Fett must discover and return to Vader a single small box, the contents of which could change the fate of the galaxy. For such an important mission, Vader cannot rely on a single operative… nor can he allow that operative to walk away alive!
